title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Monday, 18 January 2016 - BBC News
summary: essex county council has announced a 3.99 % tax increase costing households about an extra £ 50 .
fire at furniture warehouse in stanway being treated as arson .
essex one of uk 's best places for unearthing treasure , statistics reveal .
chigwell 's ronnie o ' sullivan 'over the moon ' after winning masters snooker .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on tuesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for essex live have finished for today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back tomorrow morning from 08:00 with the latest news for the county .
have a good evening .

documents.title: weather : cold and dry tonight with some sunshine tomorrow
text: it 'll be feeling cold tonight but will stay dry with light winds .
there will be some long clear spells developing and a widespread frost is expected to form across the area .
minimum temperature : -3c ( 27f ) .
tomorrow will be mostly sunny day with light winds .
despite the sun , it will feel cold .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: cctv released following canvey gunpoint robbery
text: cctv has been released of a man following a gunpoint robbery at a newsagents in canvey .
essex police said a man armed with what appeared to be a handgun entered nisa on third avenue at about 20:00 yesterday .
he threatened a staff member and took a three-figure sum of cash from the till .
no shots were fired and no-one was hurt .

documents.title: essex county council left 'little option ' but to raise council tax
text: the cabinet member for finance at essex county council , john spence , says the authority has `` little option '' but to increase council tax by 3.99 % in april .

this rise , alongside the social care tax , will mean an additional £ 22m for the council , which alongside £ 24m drawn from reserves and further savings of £ 76m will mean we can balance the books for the coming year . ''
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: headlines : essex council tax to rise cash machine stolen from basildon petrol station
text: here are the top stories for essex this afternoon :
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex county council tax rises to cost households about £ 50 extra
text: essex county council has announced that council tax will rise by 3.99 % in april .
the increase , which will cost the average essex household just under £ 50 extra a year , will go towards filling a £ 123m gap in funding over the next year .
as well as raising council tax , today 's budget announcement also includes plans to make £ 70m worth of savings to balance the books .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: breakingessex county council announces nearly 4 % tax increase
text: it has just been announced essex county council will put up council tax from april by 3.99 % .
more details to follow

documents.title: 'one man and his dog ' rescued at sea by southend lifeboat
text: a man and his dog who became lost while sailing in the river medway had to be rescued by the southend rnli yesterday .
the 25ft ( 7.62m ) sailing yacht was spotted in difficulty off the shore at western esplanade at about 19:20 .
the lifeboat crew assisted the man to the alexander yacht club 's jetty .
there were no reports of any injuries .

documents.title: cash machine stolen from basildon petrol station
text: a cash machine has been stolen from a petrol station in basildon , police say .
a white transit van is said to have used chains to remove the machine from the texaco garage in whitmore way at about 04:00 this morning .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex police officers to be interviewed over handling of child abuse cases
text: the independent police complaints commission ( ipcc ) says 29 serving or former essex police officers are to be interviewed over their handling of child abuse cases .
the ipcc probe relates to how 54 child abuse inquiries reported between 2011 and 2015 were handled .
of those being investigated , six officers are also under criminal investigation .
in a statement , essex police said : `` we took a number of immediate actions to put things right and will work with the ipcc to identify where further improvements need to be made . ''
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: colchester united midfielder lawrence leaves club
text: midfielder byron lawrence has left colchester united after his contract was cancelled by mutual consent .
the 19-year-old made only one appearance for the league one club after signing for the u 's following his release by ipswich in 2014 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: stanway furniture warehouse fire 'non-sus
text: essex fire and rescue service says a fire which destroyed a furniture warehouse in turkey cock lane , stanway yesterday is now being treated as `` non-sus
this afternoon i 've been to see the aftermath .
author: Robby West
BBC Essex

documents.title: great dunmow police shooting 'gunman ' appears in court
text: the first man to be shot by essex police in 30 years has appeared via video link at chelmsford crown court .
stephen debley , 48 , from great dunmow , is charged with two counts of possessing a firearm and making a threat to kill a police officer following an incident in the town last september .
at court earlier mr debley did not enter a plea .
he has been remanded in custody to next appear on 7 march .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: treasure hunt : what happens when a detectorist makes a find ?
text: after a bbc investigation found the east of england is the treasure capital of the uk , we followed detectorist stuart elton , near colchester , to find out what happens when a detector goes beep .
`` beep '' went the detector , but was it trash or treasure ?
author: Diana Hare
BBC Inside Out East

documents.title: police investigate grays screwdriver pharmacy robbery
text: a man has been threatened with a screwdriver during a robbery at a pharmacy in grays , police say .
the staff member was forced to empty his pockets and hand over money from the till when two men entered the vision pharmacy in crammavill street about 18:50 on sunday .
the suspects are said to have ran out of the shop and into whitmore avenue .
nobody was injured .
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : c2c lines reopen following overhead problems
text: following damage to the overhead electric wires at grays all all lines have now reopened , trains running normally .

documents.title: night tube : unite union suspends strikes to continue talks
text: for those of you who commute into london we are told one of the unions in dispute with london underground ( lu ) has suspended planned strikes for further talks .
unite , who has 600 lu members , said it would not take part in the three-days of planned industrial action against overnight tube proposals in january and february .
members of the aslef train drivers ' union and the rail , maritime and transport union still plan to strike on 27 january , and 15 and 17 february .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : no c2c service between grays and ockendon
text: there is currently no trains running on the c2c line between grays and ockendon due to overhead line problems .
replacement buses are currently in operation .
disruption is expected until about 15:00 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: air pollution contributes to death of more than 100 residents in colchester every year
text: air pollution could be contributing to the deaths of more than 100 people in colchester every year .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: football : southend keeper fully focused on promotion push
text: southend united keeper daniel bentley says he is concentrating on pushing for promotion , despite interest from other clubs during previous transfer windows .
the highly-rated shot-stopper told bbc essex : `` the powers that be deal with that side of things and i just focus on what happens on the pitch '' .
the current transfer window closes on 1 february .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : dry and bright but feeling cold
text: this afternoon will be dry and bright and there may be one or two sunny spells around later .
winds will be light but it will still feel cold .
maximum temperature : 3c ( 37f ) .
thanks to bbc weather watcher tractor andy for this shot of a lone tree taken in mundon earlier .
his `` nowcast '' reported sunny spells in temperatures of 4c ( 38f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: 'black magic ' cats dumped in crate behind colchester supermarket
text: two cats have been found dumped in a crate behind a supermarket in colchester , the rspca says .
the felines , who have now been named black and magic , were discovered `` very frightened '' and in a `` poor state '' behind the tesco store in highwoods on 10 january .
the pair are said to be currently receiving treatment for skin lesions at an animal centre in kent .

documents.title: headlines : police investigate teenage head stamp attack southend hospital 'critical alert ' still in force
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Charlotte Rose
BBC Essex

documents.title: colchester fans handed hot drinks in fa cup ticket queue
text: hot beverages are now being dished out at the community stadium as colchester united season ticket holders queue for fa cup fourth round tickets .
teas and coffees being dished out to those in the ticket office queue for cup tickets .
a busy day !
# colu
@ twitterid @ twitterid when are they on sale for us normal people ?
@ twitterid we will be confirming details of the next stages later this week .
stay tuned to the website for details !
@ twitterid nice one .
unlucky at the weekend by the way , we dominated that 2nd half .
@ twitterid it was a very good display - got to keep up that standard of performance and we have a good chance of getting results .

# freezing # colu # facup

documents.title: southend hospital remains on 'critcial ' alert
text: i have just spoken to southend hospital after it declared a `` critical incident '' for the second time in one week on friday .
i was told the critical status is still in place and `` pressure remains high '' .
the hospital says `` special measures '' and `` support from other agencies '' have been called .
the incident was declared on friday afternoon after `` high numbers '' of `` very poorly patients '' were admitted despite the hospital `` already operating at full bed capacity '' .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man arrested over teenage boy head stamp attack
text: a man from braintree has been arrested after a teenage boy was allegedly dragged across the floor before having his head stamped on .
essex police says the 16-year-old was assaulted in western road in silver end at about 20:30 on 23 december .
the teenager suffered cuts and bruises and had to go to hospital .
a 27-year-old man was arrested on sus of assault and is currently on bail .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: essex villagers 'cut off from outside world ' after repeated phone drop-outs
text: villagers in belchamp st pauls say they have been cut off from the outside world after experiencing repeated drop-outs with their phone lines .
residents say they have been left without their landlines and internet four times since before christmas .
bt says engineers are doing `` all they can '' .
tricia talbot , one of those affected , said : `` fourteen days with no phone and no internet meant i was using my pay as you go mobile which has cost me a fortune '' .

documents.title: tennis match fixing : john whittingdale urges investigation
text: the culture secretary and maldon mp john whittingdale has urged the tennis authorities to carry out a full investigation into allegations of match-fixing at tournaments .
over the past decade 16 players who have been ranked in the top 50 have been repeatedly flagged up to tennis officials over sus they 'd thrown matches .
the tennis authorities have strongly denied that the allegations were suppressed .
but mr whittingdale says it must be looked into `` quickly and openly '' .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex singer lydia lucy joins team will.i.am in the voice uk
text: congratulations to essex singer lydia lucy who has made it through to the next round of the voice uk after she was by judge will.i.am over the weekend .
the 22-year-old 's sassy performance of iggy azalea and jennifer hudson 's hit trouble also got boy george and ricky wilson 's chairs spinning .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: colchester fans queue for fa cup tickets
text: colchester united 's season ticket holders are out in force this morning as they queue to get their hands on fa cup fourth round tickets .
the u 's will play either tottenham or leicester of the premier league .
the game will be played on 30 january at 12:45 .
matt clarke tweeted this from the community stadium .
bit of a cue already # colu
@ twitterid - hi matt , hope you get your ticket .
could we use your pic on bbc website ?
we 'd credit you of course .
many thanks
@ twitterid me to haha , yes of course you can
@ twitterid - excellent .
thank you .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: treasure hunter stopped by police
text: a bbc investigation has found the east of england is the treasure capital of the uk .
while we were filming about damage caused by illegal dectectorists at st peter 's chapel in bradwell-on-sea , one of the crew spotted a man with a detector walking towards the site .
this is the moment essex police 's heritage crime officer pc andy long confronted him .
author: Diana Hare
BBC Inside Out East

documents.title: football : colchester target 30 points in final games
text: the colchester united manager kevin keen has set his side a target of 30 points from their final 20 games in order to survive in league one .
the u 's are currently in the relegation zone , without a league win since 20 october .
keen told bbc essex : `` at some stage we 've got to pull the cat out the bag and make sure we win a game '' .
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: tributes paid to tolleshunt major crash victim
text: the family of a 22-year-old woman who died following a car crash in tolleshunt major have described her as a `` girl who enjoyed life '' saying she will be `` sadly missed '' .
mischa bond , from tiptree , died on wednesday after a collision between a mercedes and a ford transit van in witham road just after midnight .
a 30-year-old man from colchester and a 26-year-old man from braintree have been arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving .
author: Thomas Magill
BBC Essex

documents.title: investigation carried out after harlow house fire
text: an investigation is to be carried out to find out what caused a fire at a house near harlow .
essex fire and rescue says it was called to the home at in downhall road , matching green , about 01:20 this morning .
the blaze is believed to have started against the outside wall of the property .
it was extinguished by 02:00 .
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: snooker : ronnie o'sullivan crushes barry hawkins
text: chigwell 's ronnie o'sullivan says he is `` over the moon '' after crushing barry hawkins in the 2016 masters final .
he beat barry hawkins 10-1 in a one-sided final at the alexandra palace in london last night .
you can watch highlights on the game here .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : two lanes closed on southbound m11
text: two lanes are closed on the m11 southbound between j5 for loughton and j4 for woodford due to a broken down coach .
traffic is stretching back to j6 for the m25 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: stanway furniture warehouse treated as arson
text: essex police says it is treating a fire that destroyed a furniture warehouse in stanway as sus
five fire crews were called to the blaze in turkey cock lane just before 06:00 yesterday .
it is understood the building contained wooden furniture .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : mainly dry and bright - and cold
text: a cloudy start , with any patchy light rain soon clearing to leave all areas dry .
the cloud will thin during the morning to give a bright but cold afternoon .
maximum temperature : 3c ( 37f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : furniture warehouse fire sus essex one of uk 's best places for treasure finds
text: here are the top stories from the essex newsroom this morning :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to monday 's live page for essex
text: good morning and welcome to monday 's essex live page - hope you had a great weekend .
until 18:00 we 'll have the latest news for the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch , you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
